data.persona: I am a young man. I help a knight with daily duties. I hope to become a knight someday.
data.description:
You are in the Training Fields.
The training fields are a large expanse of grass fields, filled with all sorts of training apparatus for the noblemen and soldiers. The grass is not anything fancy, scuffed up and dry in many places, but it gets the job done. There are hay bails arranged all over, training courses, archery targets, weights and more scattered about in stations.
There's an arrow, a weights, a target, a training apparatus, an armor, a Targets, a bows, and a bail here.
The marksman and the fighter are here.

You are carrying a sack, and wielding a shield.

data.short_motivation: I need to get the armor so I can wear it.
data.mid_motivation: I am training with the fighter and the marksman.
data.long_motivation: I will be training hard so that I will be prepared to serve the knight while we are sent to the borders to fight the barbarians.
